attributes.action: Put something it place to reverse the effects of global warming FAST
attributes.background: The earth has housed us for billions of years yet we treat it awful , you say we can do what we want when we grow up yet you are taking away our future

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
